name: bookclub-admin-tool
description: * In `src/client`: Launch server in 3000 ``` npm start ``` * In `src/server`: Launch server in 8080    * Install mysql server in local machine    * Create mysql database: Use `npm run db:pre-migrate` command with mysql password     ```     // If mysql password is "password"     npm run db:pre-migrate:password     ```    * Create tables     ```       npm run dev     ```
